static void mdc_pack_name ( struct ptlrpc_request *  req,
const struct req_msg_field *  field,
const char *  name,
size_t  name_len 
) [static]

Pack a name (path component) into a request.

Parameters:
[in] req request
[in] field request field (usually RMF_NAME)
[in] name path component
[in] name_len length of path component

field must be present in req and of size name_len + 1.

name must be '' terminated of length name_len and represent a single path component (not contain '/').

Definition at line 103 of file mdc_lib.c.

References buf, LASSERT, lu_name_is_valid_2(), RCL_CLIENT, req_capsule_client_get(), req_capsule_get_size(), ptlrpc_request::rq_pill, and strlcpy().
